Name: Glitch Puzzle
About the game: You can see eight glitch-pictures in anime style. Combine them together on different degrees of difficulty alone and with your friends! Also you can add your pictures, share screenshots and show them to friends on Steam! Characteristics: — 8 glitch anime pics — 3 degrees of difficulty — An opportunity of adding your pics
